channel.description: Recent content in springboot on Prashant Bhardwaj

item.title: Kafka Streams - WIP
item.description: If any team is using Kafka as a message broker or event sourcing system or change logs or commit log; no matter what your use case is, you must be having producers and consumers. Now at the consumer side, to process the event stream, you’ll be having one of following 2 systems - Microservices using Kafka’s Producer and Consumer API, procssing one message at a time Full fledged stream processing applications using Streaming framework as explained just above.
